Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: The extra service charges presumed on your final bill after your stay that go automatically onto the bill I HATE THAT if I wanted to tip I would add it to each bill but they already did this too anyway I am minted so it s not a problem however this is just a bit much and should change
Positive_Review: Almost everything

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: The dinner was fine but not memorable
Positive_Review: Bedroom was stylish and comfortable A very pleasant place to be The bar terrace was a special place for a drink or meal

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: The room had low ceilings and the smell is terrible it s like you are sleeping in the perfume isle The flow of the room is horrible and the finishing is not worth the 5 stars
Positive_Review: Staff and location

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Instant upgrade as soon as we arrived my partner needed cigarettes and a staff member went to collect a packet for him instantly which is excellent service We also needed urgent laundry and the housekeeping team fulfilled our request very quickly Extremely happy

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Poor room view Food was excellent in restaurant but surroundings setting could be better but assume that is down to lack of space The service throughout is excellent but in the restaurant the waiter was what I would describe as too keen He whipped plates away before one of us had finished eating which I was brought up to believe was bad manners etiquette and he was a bit pushy trying to get us to have a second main course
Positive_Review: The Maserati Quattro Porte We booked it for the transfer from Kings Cross but then also took advantage of the complimentary service provided by the hotel Staff were all very friendly and the concierge was incredibly helpful when our concert was cancelled at arranging something else for us to do Food at the Italian restaurant was delicious

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Nothing The hotel was amazing thank you for the first class hospitality
Positive_Review: The standard of service was faultless from the check in through to the checkout It has to be one of the best hotels that I have ever had the pleasure in visiting Special thanks goes to the conceirges Tadas Vitkauskas and Phillip Morris Phil went out of his way to make me feel at home and both Tadas and Phil directed me to the local shops restaurants and amenities They also gave recommendations of places to eat and visit The breakfast was excellent and so were the staff I had an omelette made to my liking before my gym session and they made my breakfast according to my dietary requirements The gym and spa was first class with outstanding staff and facilities Many thanks to the trainer Erik Solang for an excellent personal training session pushing me to my limit but giving total support and encouragement the way a personal trainer should be I had a full body massage after the training session too which helped my muscles relax and recover As I was celebrating my birthday I also received free chocolates macarons and a top of the range bottle of Prosecco I will definitely visit again when I get the chance Thank you very much for an excellent stay

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: A continental Breakfast was very expensive at 26 per person
Positive_Review: complementary prosecco in our room Arrived just before 3pm room should have been available from 2pm We sat in the bar and had a complementary cup of coffee whilst waiting

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Didn t dislike anything about this hotel
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel staff were so friendly nothing is was too much trouble beautiful rooms and great location

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fabulous complimentary use of the hotel Maserati within a 2km radius of the hotel excellent start to every day for us Terrace bar also excellent although small so get down early for a table if the sun is shining

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Only thing missing was the ability to make a normal coffee in the room there is a very good espresso machine but that s too strong for us
Positive_Review: Clean comfortable excellent location for Kensington and Albert Hall The room was very good in all aspects but the staff are the crowning glory Everyone spoke to us at all times and the reception door staff are first class probably one of the nicest hotel experiences we had in a long time Particular mention to Ricardo a very pleasant and professional receptionist

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: It was disappointing to not have any view The windows looked out to brickwork and this made the room very dark I do not like laminate flooring in a bedroom either and we had this It made the room less cosy and quite noisy We paid for breakfast on the second day and were offered a glass of water which we had This was charged 4 95 as a separate item on our breakfast bill when I feel this should have been part of the breakfast buffet
Positive_Review: We had complimentary coffee when we arrived as we were early and our room was not available The staff were attentive but not over the top or insincere Throughout the whole hotel it was immaculate and it is in a fantastic location The hotel kindly provided a car to take us back to the station on our departure

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: The refurbished bar is too bright cold and the atmosphere has been removed They also add a service charge to everything including one for housekeeping and a 1 charity donation which makes them look good
Positive_Review: Great location nice staff

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: There was no kettle tea making in the room There was a coffee machine but I don t drink coffee However when I asked for kettle cups milk and tea the staff were on to it right away
Positive_Review: The staff were amazing so friendly helpful and attentive

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Quality and choices at breakfast very good but pretty expensive
Positive_Review: Our first time in a Baglioni hotel and it definitely won t be the last If you are looking for a first class hotel that goes the extra mile to make your stay feel special then this hotel fits the bill Fantastic location across the road from Kensington Park and exceptional service and friendliness of all of the staff Made to feel very welcome at arrival by reception and this level of service and attention continued throughout our stay by all of the staff nothing was too much trouble Restaurant and bar was excellent for cocktails dinner and drinks once again the service could not be faulted Junior suite was spacious and very warmly decorated the bed was very comfortable and the nightly turn down service was a very nice touch only a 5 minute walk from the Royal Albert Hall

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The size cleanliness overall comfort of the room the staff was wonderful The location of the hotel was perfect to our venue for our evening entertainment

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Location isn t great although you re near an underground and across from Kensington Hyde Park Finally the couch in the room isn t very comfortable and the shower doesn t have a separate removable extendable showerhead
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and responsive Bed was extremely comfortable Room overall was very nice Food is amazing

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Service in the restaurant could be a little slow there were a few maintainence issues with the room but they were sorted out
Positive_Review: The room was lovely the staff are warm and welcoming There is a bartender who is a Negroni expert

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Although we booked a superior room it was very small and dark and faced to the back into an alley Bathroom needs a bit of an update but not too bad
Positive_Review: Staff were great Location very convenient for West London High St Kensington Hyde Park Knightsbridge Pleasant 30 min walk across Kensington Gardens and Hyde Park or short car ride to Oxford St Coffee machine refills of still and sparkling water and chocolates all lovely Maserati great for short trips and saved on taxis Beautiful bathroom products Other Italian touches also good We had a special rate so price ok but full price would not be good value for money

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Breakfast overpriced for what it was Also came with lettuce on the side which was a waste and got in the way No need to serve salad garnish with a breakfast
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Minor point I know it s an Italian themed hotel but for non coffee drinkers perhaps tea making facilities could be considered
Positive_Review: Staff were genuinely and extremely courteous Environment beautiful Rooms lovely And the restaurant serves authentic Italian fare My dishes were excellent Huge compliments to the chef please And because I m no good with names let me extend my warmest regards to All the staff who made sure my stay was perfect

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: I didn t like the dull colors it s not what matches my personality the room was very small and the door is opposite the bed the toilet is small and black floors are very cold as the floors are marble The view from the window was walls I didn t like that at checkout they added 45 on my bill saying it s for service and charity without informing me prior to adding on my bills
Positive_Review: It was great staying in the hotel staff were very welcoming the location is amazing opposite Hyde park and 10 minutes walk from Knightsbridge and harrods it s worth trying it my unlike s should not effect others as my opinion and defers from others

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Realy minor details to know the best independent shops what is hot in cultural scene what is worth to visit better TV programs realy minor details Shampoo and gel may be from Hermes or malin goetz things that matter to smart travelers
Positive_Review: Staff are perfect very kind indeed very patient with our requests and questions

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Although the espresso coffee machine was lovely in our room the addition of a kettle with tea and coffee making facilities would have suited all international guests
Positive_Review: The staff were all very friendly and accommodating We were able to check in early and were delighted when we were upgraded to a junior suite We will definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Not worth 380 for a nights stay Food I ordered to the room was not what you would expect from a 5 hotel neither was the bed
Positive_Review: The lobby was beautiful and the staff was amazing Lovely bathroom

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: We were only there for one night
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Room upgrade Classy and comfortable A hotel and staff happy in their own skin unpretentious and genuine

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Nothing it ticked all the boxes
Positive_Review: The Staff went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful The hotel has an exceptional warm comfortable feel Is in a great location We stayed for my husbands birthday and everyone went out of there way to make his day extra special by leaving a cake in the room We were also given an upgraded room which was superb and so unexpected We had friends join us for afternoon tea which was also a great experience and ended with another wonderful birthday cake Do stay at this lovely hotel if you get the chance you won t be disappointed

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: It took too long to make my porridge in the morning and the reason was because the other table had too many orders
Positive_Review: The food was great The staff very nice

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: The design is not as good as I think the furniture design interior design and light design is ok not matching with hotels of the same price The view is ok but facing the main Street and has no privacy when sit outside
Positive_Review: Location is ok close to Hyde station but far from places where things take place

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Not a thing
Positive_Review: The entite experience was wonderful The service levels offered by the staff are top class Food and beverages of exvellent quality The decor and ambience of the hotel are sublime Very conveniently situated to Kensington shopping area and underground

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: There was not one single point of the hotel and staff to dislike
Positive_Review: Upon arrival at the Hotel we found the Hotel staff provided an outstanding service and were extremely impressed by the standard of our suite We felt that no request was to much trouble Bed was a dream to sleep on We would recommend this hotel to friends family and business colleagues without any fears of disappointment

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: If I had to critique pillows were a little too hard
Positive_Review: Fantastic Hotel very Helpful staff Donato Bottiglieri Federico Floris Tim Spencer and Tasas Vitkauskas could not do enough for us Maserati Quatraporte was great to use within 2 mile radius

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: On arrival mid morning we were invited to eat to hotel As we had missed breakfast due to early flight we asked for some eggs toast and coffee The waitress said breakfast had ended 15 mins prior but she would ask chef He refused to make it I don t think this meal was an unreasonable request and would not have taken 5 mins Not what I would expect from a 5 star hotel and certainly not for the price we paid
Positive_Review: Rooms were lovely Staff very friendly

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Rooms are too dark housekeeping is not available after 11 00pm They actually sent up a doorman to change the bedsheets The restaurant cafe in the lobby is very average for a Baglioni
Positive_Review: Location only

Positive_Review: Service was 10 10 Room was Beautiful All the little extras make this hotel go the extra mile free transport in the Maserati was an added bonus too don t think about booking this hotel just book it would stay here any day with pleasure

Negative_Review: The bed was not comfortable and these days the bar are under renovation plus there is a building next to the hotel are under construction
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff and accommodating the hotel is nice and clean location a bit away from underground station but the main buses are passing on the same street

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: i have stopped in a lot of 5 star exclusive hotels the grovenor the Dorchester etc i found the prices the baglioni charged where outrageous 1 glass of wine a g t and 1 bottle lager 42 a club sandwich you charged me 6 to deliver to the room with cold chips then added 12 5 service and an additional 5 for i dont know what this by the way was on top of the 377 i paid for a room with no breakfast although apparently a snip at 24 per head and the 45 overnight parking i knew this before booking of course but the hotel is not one i will ever visit again i paid a similar amount at the grovenor much better facilities rooms and the food and drink prices were sensible by comparison this made the whole experience disappointing i wondered why the hotel was so empty and we were the only people in the bar and restaurant it was blamed on refurbish work but i guess its probably due to the expensive costs the restaurant and poorly stocked bar was mediocre at best the walls where hand painted i was told by the concierge by a child i assumed
Positive_Review: the concierge was very knowledgeable and helpful the staff were polite

Hotel_Name: Baglioni Hotel London The Leading Hotels of the World
Negative_Review: Room was dark due to the color scheme brown and gold No natural light Needs to be brighter
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful especially Phil the Concierge Really knows his stuff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff Rooms clean but not exactly sunlit Comfortably situated near Kensington Gardens It takes a ten minute walk to the next tube station Probably not quite a five star hotel but perhaps the most relaxed and welcoming accomodation in London
